translations: n.[生化] 粘蛋白；粘液素

phrs.translation: 粘蛋白, 黏蛋白, 粘液素, 黏液素
胃膜素, 胃粘膜素, 胃粘蛋白, 胃黏膜素
黏蛋白样家族, 粘蛋白样家族

sentences.sentence: Many of the neoplastic cells have clear vacuoles of mucin.
sentences.translation: 很多肿瘤细胞有明显的黏液空泡。

sentences.sentence: Regulation of mucin secretion may be under the influence of multiple pathways.
sentences.translation: 眼表粘蛋白的调节可能受多种因素影响。

sentences.sentence: Alcian blue stain showed abundant mucin deposition in collagen bundles of dermis.
sentences.translation: 阿新蓝染色在真皮胶原纤维束间有大量黏蛋白沉积。
